titles.title: Blessed Be the Name of the Lord
A strong tower

properties.copyright: 1989 Universal - Polygram International Publishing, Inc., 1989 Universal - Polygram International Publishing, Inc.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name of the Lord, Most High;
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name of the Lord, Most High.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
The name of the Lord is a strong tower,
The righteous run into it and they are saved.
The name of the Lord is a strong tower,
The righteous run into it and they are saved.
